Txikiteo is one of Barcelona's best kept secrets offering delicious traditional Spanish food that doesn't put a dent in your wallet! Located in the Gothic Quarter, in the centre of the old city of Barcelona, Txikiteo offers a wide range of Tapas and other delightful Spanish dishes along with a large selection of beers and strong cocktails. A tapas combo with a beer will set you back only €3-5, a bargain in an area surrounded by tourist traps.We're all guilty of occasionally choosing restaurants based on reputation or how fancy or impressive they look but Txikiteo is a typically humble example of a restaurant that lets it's food and service do the talking. What you get is a traditional Spanish tapas restaurant that offers tasty tapas delights to fill you up along with a selection of drinks that will prepare you for the evening to come.Add to this friendly staff, great service and very affordable prices and you have the perfect quick lunch or dinner option. They even have free Wi-Fi. Winning!
